backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining data types, storage maps, access control, and user-facing methods for academic entries, coding challenges, attempts, and profiles.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that normalizes stored academic entry maxMarksPerSubject values based on grade and term rules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing a requirement related to correct per-subject percentage calculations and listing relevant frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference in build or documentation processes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the page structure and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup, admin checks, and module navigation.
frontend/src/components/AcademicModule.t: Wrapper component providing tabs for adding marks and viewing academic progress.
frontend/src/components/AddMarksForm.tsx: Dynamic form for submitting academic marks with grade-based subject sets, validation, and max‑marks utilities.
frontend/src/components/CodingEditor.tsx: Python editor UI allowing users to run code via Pyodide and save attempts for selected challenges.
frontend/src/components/CodingHistory.ts: Displays saved coding attempts with timestamps, scores, and code details using an accordion UI.
frontend/src/components/CodingModule.tsx: Wraps the coding editor and history views inside tab navigation for the coding section.
frontend/src/components/DataManagement.t: Admin tool for importing and exporting academic and coding data in JSON or CSV formats.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling module selection, theme switching, and authentication state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for users to submit and save their profile name on first setup.
frontend/src/components/ProgressView.tsx: Displays academic progress with sortable entries, computed statistics, and charts using fetched data.
frontend/src/components/UserManagement.t: Provides a form for assigning user roles by principal ID with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an actor instance tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePyodide.ts: Initializes a shared Pyodide instance and exposes a hook for running Python code asynchronously.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, academic data, roles, and exam results via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for the app.
frontend/src/lib/boardExam.ts: Provides Grade 10 board exam calculations, including AI substitution for the lowest core subject if it increases the total.
frontend/src/lib/maxMarks.ts: Defines grade‑wise max marks rules and utilities to compute per‑subject and term maximum marks, including special handling for AI and Computer.
frontend/src/lib/percent.ts: Utility functions for clamping, formatting, and calculating percentages based on marks and max marks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, plugins, colors, animations, and content scanning paths.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing recent fixes, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes.
